name: PokeTCG Sim - Open Card Packs!
description:
The best Poké TCG pack opening simulator to help you make the best purchases on cards!

This is an unofficial app to help you simulate and open FREE booster packs for EVERY set for FREE, track your collection value and stats, and buy the best cards directly from TCGplayer.com right from your device.

Thousands of smart and savvy trainers have used this simulator to grow their collections, and so can you! Gotta collect 'em all!

PokeTCG Sim is not produced, endorsed, supported, or affiliated with Nintendo, The Pokémon Company, nor GAMEFREAK. The literal and graphical information presented in this app about Pokémon and the Pokémon Trading Card Game, including card images, symbols, and text, is copyright and trademarked by their respective owners.
